mapper.select: SELECT device_maintain.device_maintain_id AS deviceMaintainId, device_maintain.device_fault_id AS deviceFaultId, device_maintain.device_maintain_emp_id AS deviceMaintainEmpId, device_maintain.device_maintain_date AS deviceMaintainDate, device_maintain.device_maintain_result AS deviceMaintainResult, device_maintain.device_maintain_cost AS deviceMaintainCost, device_maintain.note FROM device_maintain
